mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ai_client(client_id, client_name, description, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{clientId}, #{clientName}, #{description}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE ai_client SET client_name = #{clientName}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, client_id, client_name, description, status, create_time, update_time FROM ai_client WHERE status = 1 ORDER BY create_time DESC
